@emmaswannphoto usually the commercial flight industry is just used to plug gaps but as the demand for cargo is so high right now, most airlines are solely running routes to do that. i have an aviation-obsessed cousin who tells me this stuff
@emmaswannphoto *imports, even!

@emmaswannphoto i believe most, if not all, commercial flights also carry imported cargo. throughout the pandemic, i was told a lot of passenger flights still ran without passengers to allow for important to still happen. not all, of course but a lot.

at least email me to explain what the fault investigation came up with before just sending them back to me no explanation? thats really inadequate customer service, off the back of the fact a fault has developed with my shoes after just two months.

@ASOS_HeretoHelp i got in touch with you via email a few weeks back about a fault issue with my nike shoes. i sent them back via a return you created, and have not heard a word since. the shoes have now just been re-delivered to me with no communication or paperwork. not cool?

i really, really hate this year.

also, can we just give the most massive of fucking shout outs to all the women who make such incredible music, and overcome the shit thrown at them daily to do so?! fuck yes 2020 - us finally celebrating this is maybe the best thing to come out of this of a year. https://t.co/IHBFW97t4l

have obv been a massive clich by naming @yelyahwilliams solo album my favourite record of 2020 (and wut) but i am consistently confounded and comforted by her capacity for openness, even in the darkest of times. thanks for keeping me company over these turbulent few months. https://t.co/bffktfaKnR

@easyJet hi, my partners flight was cancelled back in april and he requested a refund over 90 days ago now (on 23rd April) and hes still waiting for his money back. hes just spent 62 minutes on hold to customer service phone line but no answer - can you help at all?

@JamesParrish i just took a week off and despite, at first, thinking god, what a waste if im not going anywhere, or doing x, i realised its less about what you do and its more about giving myself a bit of time away from the constant bizarre cycle of life right now.

@JamesParrish 100% worth taking some time off. if this were an alternate universe, and things were relatively normal, you wouldnt think twice about having a day or two away from emails every couple of weeks - i think its important to remember that!
@_rfalexander fuuuuuuucking hell

hello! our DIYsolation festival is in full swing over on our instagram page and itd be bloody lovely if you fancied tuning in (or even donating a lil bit of to help musicians!) - go go go!! https://t.co/SYKpvl65W9 https://t.co/iFjhIHa6na
@_DanielleWarren best recipe ever: https://t.co/ahm419C1MU i always do half amounts though and it makes plenty. also swap the walnuts for white or milk chocolate
@_DanielleWarren @LouiseRamsay_ ive never used cocoa powder!!!

on a more serious note: were throwing the DIYsolation Festival to both entertain our lovely readers while were all at home, and to try and raise some money for @HelpMusiciansUK. if you can donate, please do! https://t.co/vWCDesCZkM
get on the bank holiday bevs and join in our virtual fest https://t.co/0vwHYTkB36

none of this really went how we had originally planned four(?) weeks ago but i feel v lucky to have had this lot by my side during this weird time. big thanks to @lisaannewright @emmaswannphoto @ellywatson @sawn_off @coecoechanel @DIYmusicLTD

HELLO! were all facing our own uphill struggles right now, but it feels incredibly good to have finally released our new issue. the past few weeks have been more challenging than any of my time at DIY so i wanna give a huuuge shout out to the team whove worked so hard on this! https://t.co/SpuB5xBaSz

@HelloFreshUK hi, can you reply to my DM please? appreciate youre v busy right now but ive still not had any tangible contact about my missing ingredients / refund.

@HelloFreshUK hey there, just received my HelloFresh box and has discovered i also havent been sent any chicken for the two chicken-based recipes i ordered. cant get through on the phone so can you help please? i also had a few (less essential) items missing last week

@ASOS_HeretoHelp @Hermesparcels hey, i ordered last thursday using my next day delivery, received confirmation Hermes had my order at the local depot on friday but its been delayed since then. yesterday at 1pm the tracker said itd be on the move in 24 hours but still no news?
my hero https://t.co/0sK7R1qxRW

i know its incredibly hard to stay positive right now and a lot of people (myself included) are struggling, so i wanted to share this article that helped to give me a bit of perspective in this very confusing time. https://t.co/W5p7cgNaCj
if youre at home today and fancy getting a live music fix, were live-streaming sets from both porridge radio and king nun this afternoon! go go go watch now! https://t.co/MJxoInv1Xe

@LNER hello, aware theres a lot going on right now but ive not received any contact from yourselves about my seat guarantee claim, which was filed on 23/2/20. were now a few days past the 14 working day response time, so i wanted to check in. thanks
just a friendly reminder that the WHO hasnt changed its stance on international travel at all over the past week. in fact, its currently actively advising AGAINST travel restrictions

truly gutted for the whole sxsw team, the artists who were heading there and anyone and everyone whos put so much work into this over the last year. we must not let fear win and have even more events cancelled this year - it could be devastating on a much wider scale. https://t.co/mzptRJ2Mfx

RT @lexcanroar: you're allowed to be shocked sad that Caroline Flack is dead *and* take the abuse allegations seriously *and* think that

@LNER thanks - seat reservations are still appearing on the screens and there hasnt been any sort of announcement (so im not personally convinced they have been lifted), but its all a bit confusing for anyone new who boards.

@LNER when people are politely asking others to leave their reserved seats (ourselves included), theres a lot of confusion / aggression being thrown around. if any announcements can be made, that would help to clarify things.

@LNER im travelling on the delayed 9.24 from kings x to durham. theres been a LOT of bother with seat reservations. people from the cancelled 8.30 train saying they get priority over people with reservations on the 9.24/ seat res have been lifted but no announcements to clarify

on the train home, no one sat next to me. bags all in the luggage rack with no trouble. the dream is alive and well.
@ginandconnick oh my god no way

and helping to save the NHS is just one tiny part of the reason that we must get rid of the conservatives today. this is no longer about lies and squabbles; this is about our families, and our futures. #ForTheManyNotTheFew

without the NHS i would not have the life i lead now - hell, i might not have had a life at all - and so every time i visit the RVI now i am filled with gratitude at what these people did for me, for free.

when i first started to understand my condition as i got older, i remember asking my mam what couldve happened if they hadnt caught and treated my juvenile rheumatoid arthritis when they did. id have definitely gone blind, if not worse.

every time i walk into the eye department at the RVI in newcastle, i see people i recognise, people ive been seeing for over 20 years. my optometrist - the incredible mr garvey - has seen me grow from a 5 year old getting to grips with my cataract removal to a fully grown woman.

if someone were to ask me to write a piece about my experience with the NHS, i could probably write a book. for the majority of my life, i have been in and out of hospitals, i have been supported by doctors and nurses, and even to this day, i still attend at least twice a year.

@JNewellPhotos i had never really done it til recently but a girl on the counter that did my make up was like oh i always give out samples because people should get to try stuff before they commit which was so nice to hear haha.

@JNewellPhotos bit delayed here but also, if you dont wanna spend too much , go to counters and ask for samples. MAC are good at giving out lil foundation and primer pots and might give you a few options to build on without being out of pocket!
